**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- This oak branch grows leaves in spring that change color in autumn and shed in winter. While wielding it, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify plants and fungi. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Verdant Staff **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 225 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_tanglefoot_](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
  • **1st** [_shillelagh_](/Spells.aspx?ID=282) (can target the _verdant staff_)
  • **2nd** [_barkskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [_entangle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [_shape wood_](/Spells.aspx?ID=277), [_tree shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=342)
Verdant Staff (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 1,750 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_wall of thorns_](/Spells.aspx?ID=366)
  • **4th** _barkskin_, [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)
  • **5th** [_plant form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=223), _wall of thorns_
name: Verdant Staff
